name: Knight Point Systems CloudSeed
short_description: Knight Point Systems’ Cloudseed is a portfolio of solutions that spans a customer’s technology needs across multiple phases of cloud adoption.
long_description: Knight Point Systems’ Cloudseed is a portfolio of solutions that spans a customer’s technology needs across multiple phases of cloud adoption.  The KPS Federal Community Cloud is an off-premise IaaS solution that leverages Cisco hardware, world-class Equinix facilities, and open-source technology to provide compute, storage, and network resources to Federal customers in a secure manner.  Customers can engage resources in an a la carte, and “pay for performance” model that allows them to know exactly what to expect – It’s the technology you need, when you need it.  The resources are managed and monitored through the KPS tool “Zeus”, which allows management of cloud resources across all of a customer’s cloud deployments – Public, Community, and Private – giving them the ability to have true “hybrid” cloud solutions that are right-sized for their needs.
